error_description: Development design fault (nonmalicious, software): raw SQL concatenation 'SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = \'' + username + '\'' → SQL injection vulnerability (interaction fault potential, high propagation to data breach failure)
Development omission fault (nonmalicious, software): missing @Valid/@Validated on @RequestBody UserRequest in create → unvalidated input persists (potential data integrity error)
Development omission fault (nonmalicious, software): missing addressRepository.save(addressEntity) → address not persisted, returns un-saved entity (error in stored info state, content failure)
